schema.name: Salad Dressing - Garlic Mayo (500 ML)

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and finely mince the garlic cloves.
In a mixing bowl, combine the minced garlic with mayonnaise.
Add the vinegar to the mayo and garlic mixture and whisk until the vinegar is well incorporated and the mixture is smooth.
Transfer the garlic mayo to a container and refrigerate for at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to meld together.

schema.description: This Garlic Mayo Salad Dressing recipe is perfect for those looking to add a flavorful twist to their salads without compromising on health. Although it is tagged as high-sodium and high-sugar, this version has been healthified to fit into healthy eating plans, making it a guilt-free addition to your meals.
